column5: Beware of the 3 bridge crossing into the WNY....as per Buffalo News. http://www.buffalonews.com/city/communities/buffalo/article296238.ece
Sunday it took us an hour and a half to cross at the peace bridge. That was at noon. On the way back at 11:30pm it took us a half hour.

I just got expensive gasoline near the Buffalo Airport and the gas station was FILLED with cars from Ontario and even one from NS...talked to the family from NS and they said gasoline was like $1 or more per gallon cheaper here and it was a Mobil Station with one of the highest prices in town.

The whiners in the article must have had there head stuck up their If they didn't plan (like kickingfrog did) & expect a 2+ hour wait they deserved to miss part of the game. They must have been liberals
